Text.Page:
I have a message for Otus at Vanguard Bastion. Tell him the pirates are going to move the bombs and the "magic stone"—whatever that is—soon.

If he wants to do anything about it, now is the time.

Any news from Armentes?

A magic stone...like a dementalith that Lok's cultists use? Nah...lots of angry pirates, but no crazy ones.

Maybe it hasn't been activated yet?
